channel.title: Why dont it work?

item.title: Why dont it work?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Ok I try so when you use Object 313 (Wheat) gives you grain but it wont work No erros just dont work.

Also WHne I try to do object 12121 (Open chest [Zanaris]) tried ot make it bank wont work wither any suggestions?

Coding:

if (objectID == 0313) //Wheat { wheat(); } if (objectID == 12121) //Zanaris bank { openUpBank(); }

Voids:

public void wheat() { addItem(1947,1); sendMessage("You pick the grain..."); }

And:

public void openUpBank() { sendFrame248(5292, 5063); resetItems(5064); IsBanking = true; sendQuest("@whi@The Bank of Zozumascape", 5383); }[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 10:04:30 PM[/size][hr]Anyone Know!?

Read full topic
